metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Machine Learning Data
Up to 80% of a Machine Learning project is about Collecting Data :
content.html: Up to 80% of a Machine Learning project is about Collecting Data:

content.text: What is Data?
Data can be many things.
content.html: Data can be many things.

content.text: With Machine Learning, data is collections of facts:
content.html: With Machine Learning, data is collections of facts:

content.text: Intelligence Needs Data
Human intelligence needs data:
content.html: Human intelligence needs data:

content.text: A real estate broker needs data about sold houses to estimate prices.
content.html: A real estate broker needs data about sold houses to estimate prices.

content.text: Artificial Intelligence also needs data:
content.html: Artificial Intelligence also needs data:

content.text: A Machine Learning program needs data to estimate prices.
content.html: A Machine Learning program needs data to estimate prices.

content.text: Data can help us to see and understand.
content.html: Data can help us to see and understand.

content.text: Data can help us to find new opportunities.
content.html: Data can help us to find new opportunities.

content.text: Data can help us to resolve misunderstandings.
content.html: Data can help us to resolve misunderstandings.

content.text: Healthcare
Healthcare and life sciences collect public health data and patient data to learn how to improve patient care and save lives.
content.html: Healthcare and life sciences collect public health data and patient data to learn how to improve patient care and save lives.

content.text: Business
The most successful companies in many sectors are data driven. They use sophisticated data analytics to learn how the company can perform better.
content.html: The most successful companies in many sectors are data driven. They use sophisticated data analytics to learn how the company can perform better.

content.text: Finance
Banks and insurance companies collect and evaluate data about customers, loans and deposits to support strategic decision-making.
content.html: Banks and insurance companies collect and evaluate data about customers, loans and deposits to support strategic decision-making.

content.text: Storing Data
The most common data to collect are Numbers and Measurements.
content.html: The most common data to collect are Numbers and Measurements.

content.text: Often data are stored in arrays representing the relationship between values.
content.html: Often data are stored in arrays representing the relationship between values.

content.text: This table contains house prices versus size:
content.html: This table contains house prices versus size:

content.text: Quantitative vs. Qualitative
Quantitative data are numerical:
content.html: Quantitative data are numerical:

content.text: Qualitative data are descriptive:
content.html: Qualitative data are descriptive:

content.text: Census or Sampling
A Census is when we collect data for every member of a group.
content.html: A Census is when we collect data for every member of a group.

content.text: A Sample is when we collect data for some members of a group.
content.html: A Sample is when we collect data for some members of a group.

content.text: If we wanted to know how many Americans smoke cigarettes, we could ask every person in the US (a census), or we could ask 10 000 people (a sample).
content.html: If we wanted to know how many Americans smoke cigarettes, we could ask every person in the US (a census), or we could ask 10 000 people (a sample).

content.text: A census is Accurate , but hard to do. A sample is Inaccurate , but is easier to do.
content.html: A census is Accurate, but hard to do. A sample is Inaccurate, but is easier to do.

content.text: Sampling Terms
A Population is group of individuals (objects) we want to collect information from.
content.html: A Population is group of individuals (objects) we want to collect information from.

content.text: A Census is information about every individual in a population.
content.html: A Census is information about every individual in a population.

content.text: A Sample is information about a part of the population (In order to represent all).
content.html: A Sample is information about a part of the population (In order to represent all).

content.text: Random Samples
In order for a sample to represent a population, it must be collected randomly.
content.html: In order for a sample to represent a population, it must be collected randomly.

content.text: A Random Sample , is a sample where every member of the population has an equal chance to appear in the sample.
content.html: A Random Sample, is a sample where every member of the population has an equal chance to appear in the sample.

content.text: Sampling Bias
A Sampling Bias (Error) occurs when samples are collected in such a way that some individuals are less (or more) likely to be included in the sample.
content.html: A Sampling Bias (Error) occurs when samples are collected in such a way that some individuals are less (or more) likely to be included in the sample.

content.text: Big Data
Big data is data that is impossible for humans to process without the assistance of advanced machines.
content.html: Big data is data that is impossible for humans to process without the assistance of advanced machines.

content.text: Big data does not have any definition in terms of size, but datasets are becoming larger and larger as we continously collect more and more data and store data at a lower and lower cost.
content.html: Big data does not have any definition in terms of size, but datasets are becoming larger and larger as we continously collect more and more data and store data at a lower and lower cost.

content.text: Data Mining
With big data comes complicated data structures.
content.html: With big data comes complicated data structures.

content.text: A huge part of big data processing is refining data.
content.html: A huge part of big data processing is refining data.
